an8.59:1: "Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, puggalā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa? Katame aṭṭha? Sotāpanno, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, anāgāmī, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno. Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha puggalā āhuneyyā … pe … anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti.
an8.59:2: Cattāro ca paṭipannā,cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;Esa saṅgho ujubhūto,paññāsīlasamāhito.
an8.59:3: Yajamānānaṁ manussānaṁ,Puññapekkhāna pāṇinaṁ;Karotaṁ opadhikaṁ puññaṁ,Saṅghe dinnaṁ mahapphalan"ti.
